channel.title: CFD on Jatinder Pal
channel.description: Recent content in CFD on Jatinder Pal

item.title: LU-SGS
item.description: Lower Upper Symmertic Gauss Sidel method is matrix free implicit time-integration scheme. If we spatilly discretize any governing eqution; using any one of the well known methods: Finite difference method, Finite Volume method, Finite element method, etc; we as left with system of odinary differential equations. $$V\frac{dU_i}{dt} = R_i^{n+1}$$ Where, “$i$” represents the cell center or cell node point based on the spatial discrtization method. U and R are the state and residual vector stored at spatial point “$i$”.
